gameCategories.name: Beyond bonds
gameCategories.subtitle: Dive deep into meaningful conversations and discover new layers of understanding with those around you.

gameOverMessage.message: EACH PLAYER WRITE A REFLECTION ABOUT YOUR TIME TOGETHER. FOLD & EXCHANGE. OPEN WHEN YOU NEED A REMINDER OF THIS MOMENT
EACH PLAYER WRITE A WORD OF ENCOURAGEMENT FOR THE OTHER. FOLD AND EXCHANGE. OPEN WHEN YOU NEED A BOOST
EACH PLAYER WRITE A NOTE OF GRATITUDE TO THE OTHER. FOLD & EXCHANGE. OPEN WHEN YOU WANT TO FEEL APPRECIATED
EACH PLAYER WRITE WHAT YOU BELIEVE THE OTHER’S SUPERPOWER IS. FOLD AND EXCHANGE. OPEN WHEN YOU NEED TO FEEL EMPOWERED
EACH PLAYER WRITE DOWN A MEANINGFUL LESSON YOU'VE LEARNED FROM THE OTHER. FOLD & EXCHANGE. OPEN WHEN YOU SEEK INSPIRATION
EACH PLAYER WRITE A PROMISE TO THE OTHER. FOLD AND EXCHANGE. OPEN WHEN YOU NEED REASSURANCE

gameStartMessages.message:
Two Ways to Play

1. Pass the phone: After your turn, pass the phone to the next player.
2. Appoint a Host: One player reads all the questions and wildcards.

questions.q: WHAT ABOUT ME MAKES YOU CURIOUS?
WHAT'S SOMETHING ABOUT ME THAT SEEMS UNUSUAL OR INTERESTING TO YOU?
WHAT SONG DO YOU THINK I WOULD ROCK AT KARAOKE?
FINISH THE SENTENCE: AT FIRST GLANCE, YOU SEEM...
DO I SEEM LIKE I PREFER MORNINGS OR NIGHTS? WHY?
WOULD YOU GUESS I'M A CAT PERSON OR A DOG PERSON?
WAS I THE TYPE TO BE POPULAR IN SCHOOL? EXPLAIN.
WHAT KIND OF COMPLIMENT DO YOU THINK I HEAR MOST OFTEN?
WHAT DOES MY PHONE WALLPAPER SAY ABOUT ME?
DO I REMIND YOU OF SOMEONE YOU KNOW?
WHAT DO YOU THINK I LOVE TO SPEND MONEY ON?
WHAT DO YOU THINK MY INSTAGRAM FEED LOOKS LIKE?
WHAT WAS YOUR MOST COMMON YAHOO MESSENGER STATUS IF YOU HAD ONE?
WHAT IS MY BODY LANGUAGE TELLING YOU RIGHT NOW?
WOULD I ENJOY CAMPING? HOW ELABORATE WOULD MY SETUP BE?
HOW MANY SPEEDING TICKETS DO YOU THINK I’VE GOTTEN?
WHAT’S THE FIRST THING YOU NOTICED ABOUT ME?
DO YOU THINK I FALL IN LOVE EASILY? WHY OR WHY NOT?
WHO DO YOU THINK MY CELEBRITY CRUSH IS?
DO I SEEM MORE CREATIVE OR ANALYTICAL? EXPLAIN.
DO YOU THINK I’VE EVER SNOOPED THROUGH SOMEONE’S PHONE?
WHAT FAST FOOD PLACE DO YOU THINK I FREQUENT MOST? WHAT’S MY ORDER?
DO YOU THINK I INTIMIDATE OTHERS? WHY OR WHY NOT?
DO YOU THINK I’VE EVER BEEN FIRED FROM A JOB? IF SO, FOR WHAT?
DO I LOOK LIKE A KIND PERSON? EXPLAIN.
IF I WERE TO PLAY IN A MOVIE, WHAT ROLE DO YOU THINK I WOULD HAVE?
WHAT SCHOOL SUBJECT DO YOU THINK I EXCELLED IN? DID I STRUGGLE WITH ANY?
ON A SCALE OF 1-10, HOW MESSY DO YOU THINK MY CAR IS? 1 BEING SPOTLESS, 10 A TOTAL DISASTER. EXPLAIN.
WHAT WAS YOUR FIRST IMPRESSION OF ME?
DO I SEEM LIKE SOMEONE WHO WOULD GET A NAME TATTOOED? WHY OR WHY NOT?
AS A CHILD, WHAT DO YOU THINK I DREAMED OF BECOMING?
WHAT DO MY SHOES SAY ABOUT ME?
WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MOST CHALLENGING PART OF MY JOB?
DO YOU THINK I’M USUALLY EARLY, ON TIME, OR LATE TO EVENTS? EXPLAIN.
DESCRIBE YOUR FAVORITE HOBBY AND WHAT IT MEANS TO YOU.
IF I WERE A FLAVOR, WHAT WOULD I BE?
WHAT TYPE OF MOVIE GENRE DO YOU THINK I ENJOY MOST?
IF I WERE TO HOST A PODCAST, WHAT WOULD IT BE ABOUT?
WHAT'S ONE WORD YOU THINK BEST DESCRIBES ME?
IF I WERE AN ANIMAL, WHICH ONE DO YOU THINK I'D BE?
WHAT KIND OF VACATION DESTINATION DO YOU THINK I PREFER? BEACH, MOUNTAINS, CITY, OR COUNTRYSIDE?
WHAT BOARD GAME OR VIDEO GAME DO YOU THINK I’D BE REALLY GOOD AT?
WHAT'S A JOB YOU THINK I WOULD NEVER DO?
IF I WERE A SEASON, WHICH ONE WOULD I BE AND WHY?
WHICH FICTIONAL CHARACTER DO YOU THINK I RELATE TO THE MOST?
WHAT KIND OF CUISINE DO YOU THINK I ENJOY THE MOST?
IF I WERE TO PLAN A PARTY, WHAT THEME DO YOU THINK IT WOULD HAVE?
DO YOU THINK I PREFER SUNRISES OR SUNSETS? WHY?
WHAT DO YOU THINK MY FAVORITE TIME OF DAY IS? MORNING, AFTERNOON, EVENING, OR NIGHT? DISCUSS.
WHAT KIND OF CLOTHING STYLE DO YOU THINK I PREFER?
WHAT’S SOMETHING UNCOMMON OR STRANGE THAT YOU OFTEN CARRY AROUND?
WHAT MUSIC FESTIVAL WOULD YOU LOVE TO ATTEND AND WHY?
WHAT'S ONE ITEM YOU THINK I COULD NEVER LIVE WITHOUT?
IF I COULD HAVE ANY PET, REAL OR IMAGINARY, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
WHAT TV SHOW DO YOU THINK I COULD BINGE-WATCH ALL WEEKEND?
WHAT DO YOU THINK MY IDEAL WEEKEND LOOKS LIKE?
WHAT IS ONE THING YOU THINK I LOVE TO TALK ABOUT?
IF YOU HAD TO EAT THE SAME MEAL EVERY DAY FOR A MONTH, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
WHAT’S A CELEBRITY OR HISTORICAL FIGURE YOU THINK I’D GET ALONG WITH AND WHY?
WHAT TYPE OF BOOKS OR MOVIES DO YOU THINK I’M MOST DRAWN TO?
IF I WERE TO WIN AN AWARD, WHAT DO YOU THINK IT WOULD BE FOR?
WHAT DO YOU THINK MY FAVORITE HOLIDAY OR CELEBRATION IS?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU THINK I WOULD DO IF I HAD A WHOLE DAY TO MYSELF?
IF I WERE TO START A BUSINESS, WHAT KIND OF BUSINESS DO YOU THINK IT WOULD BE?
WHAT'S ONE THING YOU THINK I WOULD CHANGE ABOUT THE WORLD?
IF YOU COULD RECOMMEND A HOBBY FOR ME, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
WHAT'S THE FIRST THING YOU NOTICE ABOUT PEOPLE?
WHAT KIND OF GADGET OR TOOL DO YOU THINK I WOULD FIND MOST USEFUL?
IF I WERE TO WRITE A BOOK, WHAT GENRE WOULD IT BE?
WHAT’S ONE SKILL YOU THINK I’D BE NATURALLY GOOD AT?
WHAT’S A FUN FACT YOU THINK I SHOULD KNOW ABOUT YOU?
WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MOST INTRIGUING THING ABOUT ME SO FAR?

wildcards.q: WILDCARD: MAINTAIN EYE CONTACT FOR THIRTY SECONDS. WHAT DO YOU FEEL?
WILDCARD: THINK OF YOUR FAVORITE BREAKFAST CEREAL. ON THE COUNT OF 3, SAY YOUR ANSWER OUT LOUD! (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: CLOSE YOUR EYES. WHAT COLOR ARE MY EYES?
WILDCARD: ASK AND ANSWER THE NEXT QUESTION IN A DIFFERENT ACCENT (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: WRITE DOWN SOMETHING PEOPLE WOULDN’T GUESS ABOUT YOU JUST BY LOOKING AT YOU (BOTH PLAYERS). COMPARE.
WILDCARD: DRAW A PORTRAIT OF EACH OTHER TO THE BEST OF YOUR ABILITY (1 MIN). EXCHANGE.
WILDCARD: THINK OF YOUR FAVORITE CHILDHOOD TV SHOW. ON THE COUNT OF 3, SAY IT OUT LOUD! (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: MAKE AN ASSUMPTION ABOUT ME (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: RATE YOUR DANCING SKILLS ON A SCALE OF 1-10. ON THE COUNT OF 3, SAY YOUR ANSWERS OUT LOUD! (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: DRAW A PICTURE TOGETHER (30 SECONDS).
WILDCARD: SHARE A MEMORY ASSOCIATED WITH YOUR FAVORITE FOOD. (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: MIMIC EACH OTHER'S LAUGH FOR 30 SECONDS.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE YOUR DAY SO FAR USING ONLY SOUND EFFECTS. (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: SHARE YOUR FAVORITE SONG LYRIC AND GUESS WHY IT'S MEANINGFUL TO EACH OTHER. (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: SHOW THE LAST PHOTO YOU TOOK ON YOUR PHONE AND EXPLAIN IT.
WILDCARD: HUM YOUR FAVORITE SONG AND GUESS EACH OTHER'S. (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: SHARE A FUNNY CHILDHOOD MEMORY IN ONE MINUTE. (BOTH PLAYERS)
WILDCARD: EXCHANGE ONE OF YOUR FAVORITE JOKES AND RATE EACH OTHER'S HUMOR.
WILDCARD: THINK OF AN OBJECT THAT REPRESENTS YOU AND EXPLAIN IT TO EACH OTHER.
WILDCARD: MAKE UP A SHORT STORY USING THREE RANDOM WORDS FROM YOUR CONVERSATION.
WILDCARD: DO YOUR BEST IMPRESSION OF A CELEBRITY OR CHARACTER FOR 30 SECONDS.
WILDCARD: MAKE UP A NEW WORD AND DEFINE IT. USE IT IN A SENTENCE WITH EACH OTHER.
WILDCARD: TELL EACH OTHER ABOUT YOUR IDEAL VACATION DESTINATION.
WILDCARD: SHOW EACH OTHER YOUR FAVORITE PHOTO ON YOUR PHONE AND SHARE THE STORY BEHIND IT.
WILDCARD: INVENT A NEW HOLIDAY AND DESCRIBE HOW PEOPLE WOULD CELEBRATE IT.
WILDCARD: SHARE A FUN FACT ABOUT YOURSELF THAT NOBODY ELSE KNOWS.
WILDCARD: GIVE EACH OTHER A “UNIQUE SUPERPOWER” BASED ON YOUR FIRST IMPRESSION.

questions.q: WHAT’S THE MOST PRESSING QUESTION YOU’RE SEEKING ANSWERS TO RIGHT NOW?
WHAT’S YOUR EARLIEST MEMORY OF TRUE JOY?
HAS YOUR PERSPECTIVE ON ANYTHING SHIFTED RECENTLY?
FINISH THE STATEMENT: PEOPLE MIGHT SEE ME AS …, BUT I KNOW THAT I AM … .
WHAT’S THE MOST MYSTIFYING EXPERIENCE YOU’VE EVER HAD?
ARE YOU MORE AFRAID OF FAILING OR SUCCEEDING? EXPLAIN WHY.
IF YOU COULD DESIGN YOUR IDEAL SCENARIO, WHO WOULD YOU BE WITH, WHERE, AND WHAT WOULD YOU BE DOING?
WHEN PEOPLE ASK YOU 'HOW ARE YOU?', HOW OFTEN DO YOU GIVE A FULLY HONEST RESPONSE?
WHAT WOULD YOUR YOUNGER SELF FIND MOST SURPRISING ABOUT YOUR LIFE TODAY?
WHAT DO YOU LONG FOR MORE IN YOUR LIFE?
WHAT IS ONE THING ABOUT YOURSELF THAT YOU WOULD PREFER TO KEEP AS IS?
IF YOU WERE TO TITLE THIS CURRENT CHAPTER OF YOUR LIFE, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
WHAT IS A COMPLIMENT YOU WISH YOU RECEIVED MORE OFTEN?
WHAT’S THE BEST COMPLIMENT A STRANGER HAS EVER GIVEN YOU?
HAS A STRANGER EVER HAD A SIGNIFICANT IMPACT ON YOUR LIFE?
HOW ARE YOU, DEEP DOWN?
WHAT’S YOUR FATHER’S NAME, AND WHAT’S ONE THING YOU ADMIRE ABOUT HIM?
WHAT IS THE LAST THING YOU CONCEALED FROM YOUR MOTHER?
WHAT ARE YOU STILL TRYING TO PROVE TO YOURSELF?
WHAT’S A DREAM YOU ONCE HAD BUT HAVE SINCE LET GO?
WHAT’S THE MOST JOYOUS MEMORY YOU’VE HAD IN THE PAST YEAR?
ARE YOU CURRENTLY MISSING ANYONE, AND DO YOU THINK THEY’RE MISSING YOU IN RETURN?
WHO WAS YOUR FIRST LOVE, AND WHAT MADE YOU FALL FOR THEM?
IF YOU COULD DEEPEN YOUR CONNECTION WITH ONE PERSON IN YOUR LIFE, WHO WOULD IT BE AND WHY?
LOOKING BACK, WHEN DID YOU FIRST FEEL TRULY CHALLENGED, AND WHAT HAS THAT TAUGHT YOU ABOUT YOURSELF?
IS THERE A FEELING FROM THE PAST THAT YOU WISH YOU COULD EXPERIENCE AGAIN?
ARE YOU CURRENTLY LYING TO YOURSELF ABOUT ANYTHING?
HAVE YOU EVER TOLD SOMEONE YOU LOVE THEM WITHOUT REALLY MEANING IT? IF SO, WHY?
WHAT’S YOUR MOTHER’S NAME, AND WHAT’S THE MOST BEAUTIFUL THING ABOUT HER?
DOES THE WAY YOU SEE YOURSELF ALIGN WITH HOW OTHERS PERCEIVE YOU?
HOW WOULD YOU DESCRIBE THE EXPERIENCE OF BEING IN LOVE USING JUST ONE WORD?
WHAT’S A LESSON THAT TOOK YOU THE LONGEST TO UNLEARN?
WHAT ARE THE ASPECTS OF YOUR LIFE THAT ARE WORKING WELL AND THE ONES THAT ARE CAUSING YOU PAIN?
HOW CAN YOU BECOME A BETTER VERSION OF YOURSELF?
WHAT’S THE MOST INTENSE NON-PHYSICAL PAIN YOU’VE EVER EXPERIENCED?
WHEN DID YOU LAST SURPRISE YOURSELF WITH YOUR OWN ACTIONS OR DECISIONS?
DESCRIBE YOUR IDEAL DAY FROM START TO FINISH.
WHAT IS A RECENT EXPERIENCE THAT MADE YOU FEEL VULNERABLE?
HOW DO YOU HANDLE FEELINGS OF SELF-DOUBT?
IF YOU COULD HAVE A CONVERSATION WITH YOUR FUTURE SELF, WHAT WOULD YOU ASK?
WHAT'S A DECISION YOU'VE MADE THAT YOU THINK WILL DEFINE YOUR FUTURE?
WHAT IS A PASSION PROJECT OR GOAL THAT YOU HAVEN'T PURSUED YET?
HOW DO YOU DEFINE SUCCESS FOR YOURSELF?
WHAT DOES YOUR IDEAL LIFE LOOK LIKE IN FIVE YEARS?
WHAT'S THE MOST SIGNIFICANT LESSON YOU'VE LEARNED FROM A FAILURE?
IF YOU HAD TO LIVE IN A DIFFERENT ERA, WHEN WOULD IT BE AND WHY?
WHAT'S ONE PERSONAL LIMITATION YOU'RE WORKING TO OVERCOME?
HOW DO YOU DEAL WITH REGRET?
WHAT'S ONE THING YOU WISH YOU COULD TELL YOUR TEENAGE SELF?
WHAT'S A CAUSE YOU'RE PASSIONATE ABOUT AND WHY?
WHAT ROLE DOES FORGIVENESS PLAY IN YOUR LIFE?
IF YOU COULD CHANGE ONE THING ABOUT YOUR PAST, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
WHAT'S ONE THING YOU WISH YOU COULD HAVE LEARNED EARLIER IN LIFE?
HOW DO YOU RECHARGE AFTER A STRESSFUL DAY?
WHAT'S A MOMENT YOU’RE MOST PROUD OF IN YOUR LIFE?
HOW HAS YOUR PERCEPTION OF LOVE CHANGED OVER TIME?
WHAT'S ONE THING YOU'VE LEARNED ABOUT YOURSELF FROM YOUR CLOSEST RELATIONSHIPS?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’RE CURRENTLY STRUGGLING TO ACCEPT ABOUT YOURSELF?
HOW DO YOU BALANCE YOUR PERSONAL AND PROFESSIONAL LIFE?
WHAT’S A BELIEF YOU ONCE HAD THAT YOU NO LONGER HOLD?
WHAT DOES YOUR IDEAL VERSION OF HAPPINESS LOOK LIKE?
IF YOU COULD RELIVE ONE MOMENT IN YOUR LIFE, WHAT WOULD IT BE AND WHY?
WHAT’S A CHALLENGE YOU’RE CURRENTLY WORKING TO OVERCOME?
WHAT’S ONE WAY YOU’VE GROWN IN THE PAST YEAR?
HOW DO YOU DEFINE TRUE FRIENDSHIP?
WHAT DO YOU THINK IS YOUR LIFE’S PURPOSE?
HOW DO YOU DEAL WITH UNCERTAINTY?
WHAT’S A PASSION OR INTEREST THAT YOU’D LIKE TO PURSUE MORE SERIOUSLY?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU WISH YOU UNDERSTOOD BETTER?
WHAT EMOTION DO YOU FIND MOST DIFFICULT TO EXPRESS?
HOW DO YOU HANDLE CRITICISM FROM OTHERS?
WHAT’S ONE FEAR YOU’RE TRYING TO CONFRONT?
WHAT DO YOU NEED MORE OF IN YOUR LIFE RIGHT NOW?
WHAT DO YOU THINK YOUR LIFE WILL LOOK LIKE IN TEN YEARS?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU HOPE TO LEARN IN THE NEXT YEAR?
WHAT’S A PERSONAL VALUE THAT GUIDES YOUR DECISIONS?
HOW DO YOU SHOW COMPASSION TO YOURSELF?
WHAT’S ONE WAY YOU LIKE TO CHALLENGE YOURSELF?
WHAT’S THE MOST SIGNIFICANT CHANGE YOU’VE MADE IN YOUR LIFE RECENTLY?
HOW DO YOU KNOW WHEN YOU NEED TO TAKE A BREAK?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’RE GRATEFUL FOR RIGHT NOW?
WHAT’S A HABIT YOU’RE TRYING TO DEVELOP OR BREAK?
WHAT’S THE MOST IMPORTANT THING YOU’VE LEARNED ABOUT RELATIONSHIPS?
WHAT’S ONE DREAM YOU STILL WANT TO ACHIEVE?
HOW DO YOU CELEBRATE YOUR SUCCESS?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU WOULD TELL YOUR PAST SELF TO DO DIFFERENTLY?
HOW DO YOU DEAL WITH FEELINGS OF ISOLATION?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’D LIKE TO TEACH OTHERS ABOUT YOURSELF?
HOW DO YOU STAY MOTIVATED WHEN THINGS GET TOUGH?

wildcards.q: WILDCARD: HAVE A STARE-OFF. THE FIRST TO BLINK MUST SHARE A PERSONAL CHALLENGE AND ASK FOR YOUR PARTNER’S ADVICE ON HOW TO HANDLE IT.
WILDCARD: BOTH OF YOU WRITE DOWN AN EMBARRASSING FACT ABOUT YOURSELVES. PLAY ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS; LOSER REVEALS THEIR FACT.
WILDCARD: BOTH OF YOU WRITE DOWN YOUR THREE TOP PRIORITIES IN LIFE (30 SECONDS). THEN COMPARE AND DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: PLAY SHUFFLE ON YOUR MUSIC LIBRARY. DESCRIBE THE FIRST SONG THAT PLAYS AND WHAT IT MEANS TO YOU OR WHY YOU LIKE IT.
WILDCARD: DRAW A PICTURE THAT REPRESENTS YOUR CURRENT MOOD (BOTH PLAYERS). THEN COMPARE YOUR DRAWINGS.
WILDCARD: SHARE A SECRET OR CONFESSION WITH EACH OTHER.
WILDCARD: THINK OF A POPULAR ENJOYMENT THAT YOU STRONGLY DISLIKE. ON THE COUNT OF THREE, REVEAL IT OUT LOUD!
WILDCARD: SHOW THE FIRST PHOTO IN YOUR CAMERA ROLL AND TELL THE STORY BEHIND IT.
WILDCARD: REVEAL A PERSONAL DREAM OR GOAL YOU HAVEN’T SHARED WITH MANY PEOPLE.
WILDCARD: CREATE A VISUAL MAP OF YOUR EMOTIONAL JOURNEY IN THE PAST YEAR.
WILDCARD: PERFORM A MONOLOGUE ABOUT A CHALLENGE YOU'RE CURRENTLY FACING.
WILDCARD: WRITE A LETTER TO YOUR FUTURE SELF AND READ IT ALOUD (OPTIONAL).
WILDCARD: IMAGINE YOU’RE WRITING A BOOK ABOUT YOUR LIFE. WHAT WOULD THE TITLE BE?
WILDCARD: SHARE THE THIRD MOST RECENT NOTE FROM YOUR PHONE AND TELL ME THE STORY BEHIND IT.
WILDCARD: DRAW A SELF-PORTRAIT REPRESENTING YOUR CURRENT MOOD OR STATE OF MIND.
WILDCARD: REVEAL A SECRET TALENT OR HOBBY YOU HAVEN’T SHARED BEFORE.
WILDCARD: EXPLAIN THE MOST MEANINGFUL PIECE OF ADVICE YOU’VE EVER RECEIVED.
WILDCARD: CLOSE YOUR EYES AND DESCRIBE THE SOUND OF YOUR PERFECT SCENERY.
WILDCARD: SHARE A RECURRING DREAM YOU’VE HAD AND INTERPRET IT TOGETHER.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE YOUR PERCEPTION OF AN IDEAL LIFE PARTNER.
WILDCARD: REVEAL THE MOST IMPACTFUL BOOK YOU’VE READ AND WHY IT RESONATED WITH YOU.
WILDCARD: PERFORM A 30-SECOND MONOLOGUE ABOUT A TIME YOU LEARNED A VALUABLE LESSON.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE YOUR PERFECT RELAXATION ROUTINE.
WILDCARD: SHARE A PERSONAL CHALLENGE YOU’RE CURRENTLY WORKING THROUGH AND ASK FOR ADVICE.
WILDCARD: MAKE UP A NEW HOBBY OR ACTIVITY AND EXPLAIN HOW IT WOULD IMPROVE YOUR LIFE.
WILDCARD: CREATE A MINDFULNESS EXERCISE OR MEDITATION AND GUIDE EACH OTHER THROUGH IT.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE A SCENARIO WHERE YOU'VE FELT ANXIETY AND HOW YOU CONFRONTED IT.
WILDCARD: TALK ABOUT YOUR IDEAL SELF AND WHAT YOU WOULD NEED TO DO TO REACH IT.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE, IN A FEW SENTENCES, A PERSONAL STORY YOU THINK IS IMPORTANT TO SHARE.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE A MOMENT IN YOUR LIFE THAT MADE YOU FEEL THE MOST ALIVE.
WILDCARD: CREATE A QUICK SONG ABOUT YOUR DAY SO FAR.
WILDCARD: SHARE THE MOST IMPORTANT LESSON YOU’VE LEARNED ABOUT LOVE.
WILDCARD: WRITE DOWN A COMPLIMENT YOU’VE ALWAYS WANTED TO HEAR AND READ IT ALOUD.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE HOW YOU FEEL ABOUT YOUR CURRENT LIFE CHANGES.
WILDCARD: MAKE A PLAN TO CREATE VISION BOARDS TOGETHER AND ACT UPON IT WITHIN A WEEK.
WILDCARD: SHARE A MEANINGFUL LIFE LESSON AND DISCUSS HOW IT APPLIES TO YOUR LIFE.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE A SITUATION THAT CHALLENGED YOUR VALUES AND HOW YOU RESPONDED.
WILDCARD: CREATE A LIST OF THREE WISHES FOR YOUR FUTURE AND DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: SHARE THE MOST INSPIRING LESSON YOU’VE LEARNED FROM A MENTOR.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE A TOPIC OF CONVERSATION YOU’D LIKE TO HAVE WITH SOMEONE YOU ADMIRE.
WILDCARD: MAKE A LIST OF YOUR TOP THREE PERSONAL STRENGTHS AND DISCUSS THEM.
WILDCARD: DRAW A 'ROADMAP' OF YOUR PERSONAL GROWTH OVER THE PAST YEAR.
WILDCARD: SHARE A PERSONAL REVELATION YOU’VE HAD RECENTLY AND HOW IT’S CHANGING YOUR PERSPECTIVE.
WILDCARD: SHARE AN EXPERIENCE THAT CHANGED YOUR LIFE FOREVER.

questions.q: WHAT DO YOU THINK I’M MOST AFRAID OF?
AFTER THIS GAME ENDS, WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’LL REMEMBER ABOUT ME?
AT WHAT POINT IN THIS GAME DID YOU FEEL THE STRONGEST CONNECTION WITH ME?
IS THERE ANYTHING YOU THINK I SHOULD LET GO OF IN MY LIFE?
HOW DOES SOMEONE EARN YOUR TRUST AND VULNERABILITY? HAVE I EARNED YOUR TRUST? HOW CAN I BUILD ON THAT?
IS THERE ANYTHING I CAN DO TO SUPPORT YOU RIGHT NOW?
WHAT ASPECT OF ME CAUGHT YOU OFF GUARD?
USE ONE WORD TO DESCRIBE YOUR CURRENT FEELINGS.
WHICH QUESTION WERE YOU MOST HESITANT TO ANSWER?
WHAT’S THE BIGGEST COMMONALITY BETWEEN US?
BASED ON WHAT YOU’VE LEARNED ABOUT ME, DOES MY SOCIAL MEDIA REFLECT MY TRUE SELF? WHY OR WHY NOT?
WHAT WOULD BE THE IDEAL GIFT FOR ME?
WHAT HAVE YOU LEARNED ABOUT YOURSELF FROM THIS CONVERSATION?
IN WHAT WAYS DO YOU SEE REFLECTIONS OF YOURSELF IN ME?
WHAT DO YOU THINK I NEED TO HEAR RIGHT NOW?
IF YOU COULD ADVISE ME TO DO ONE THING FOR THE REST OF THIS MONTH, WHAT WOULD IT BE AND WHY?
HOW DO OUR PERSONALITIES COMPLEMENT EACH OTHER?
WHAT CAN WE BUILD OR CREATE TOGETHER?
BASED ON WHAT YOU KNOW ABOUT ME, DO YOU HAVE ANY NETFLIX SHOWS OR MOVIES TO RECOMMEND?
WHAT’S THE QUALITY ABOUT ME THAT YOU MOST ADMIRE?
IS THERE SOMETHING ABOUT MYSELF THAT YOU THINK I SHOULD BE AWARE OF BUT MAY NOT REALIZE?
WHY DO YOU THINK OUR PATHS HAVE CROSSED?
WHAT DO YOU BELIEVE MY UNIQUE STRENGTH OR SUPERPOWER IS?
WHAT DO YOU THINK IS MY MAIN WEAKNESS?
WHAT ASPECT OF ME IS MOST DIFFICULT FOR YOU TO UNDERSTAND?
WHAT DO YOU THINK IS MY MOST DISTINCTIVE FEATURE OR CHARACTERISTIC?
WHICH ANSWER OF MINE MADE YOU LIGHT UP THE MOST?
WHAT’S A KEY LESSON YOU’LL TAKE AWAY FROM OUR CONVERSATION?
WHAT WOULD MAKE YOU FEEL EVEN CLOSER TO ME?
WHAT IS THE AREA WHERE I AM MOST QUALIFIED TO OFFER ADVICE?
DO YOU BELIEVE EVERYONE HAS A CALLING? IF SO, DO YOU THINK I’VE FOUND MINE?
WHAT IS YOUR BIGGEST DREAM?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’VE ALWAYS WANTED TO TELL ME BUT NEVER HAVE?
IF YOU HAD TO WRITE A BOOK ABOUT ME, WHAT WOULD THE TITLE BE?
HOW WOULD YOU DESCRIBE THE IMPACT I’VE HAD ON YOUR LIFE?
IF YOU COULD CHANGE ONE THING ABOUT THE WORLD, WHAT WOULD IT BE AND WHY?
WHAT PART OF OUR CONVERSATION DO YOU THINK YOU’LL REFLECT ON THE MOST?
IN WHAT WAYS HAVE I HELPED YOU SEE YOURSELF DIFFERENTLY?
WHAT’S A PERSONAL ACHIEVEMENT YOU’RE PROUD OF BUT HAVE NEVER SHARED?
HOW DO YOU THINK OUR RELATIONSHIP HAS CHANGED YOU?
WHAT’S THE ONE THING YOU WISH MORE PEOPLE UNDERSTOOD ABOUT YOU?
IF YOU COULD GIVE ME ONE PIECE OF ADVICE FOR THE FUTURE, WHAT WOULD IT BE?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’D LIKE TO IMPROVE IN OUR RELATIONSHIP?
HOW DO YOU THINK OTHERS PERCEIVE OUR RELATIONSHIP?
IF YOU COULD SPEND A DAY WITH ANYONE IN HISTORY, WHO WOULD IT BE AND WHY?
WHAT’S ONE OF YOUR DEEPEST SECRETS THAT YOU’RE READY TO SHARE?
HOW DO YOU DEAL WITH IMPOSTOR SYNDROME?
IF YOU HAD TO LIVE IN A DIFFERENT COUNTRY FOR A YEAR, WHERE WOULD YOU GO?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU WISH YOU COULD TELL YOUR PAST SELF?
WHAT’S THE MOST IMPACTFUL BOOK YOU’VE EVER READ?
HOW DO YOU ENCOURAGE YOURSELF WHEN YOU FEEL DOWN?
WHAT’S A DREAM YOU HAVEN’T PURSUED YET?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’D LIKE TO BE REMEMBERED FOR?
WHAT’S ONE CHALLENGE YOU’RE CURRENTLY FACING?
WHAT’S A PASSION OF YOURS THAT YOU’VE PUT ON HOLD?
HOW DO YOU MEASURE YOUR OWN HAPPINESS?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’VE LEARNED ABOUT YOURSELF THROUGH OUR CONVERSATION?
WHAT’S A PERSONAL TRAIT YOU ADMIRE IN OTHERS AND STRIVE TO EMBODY?
WHAT’S A TRADITION OR RITUAL THAT IS IMPORTANT TO YOU?
HOW DO YOU DEAL WITH CHANGE IN YOUR LIFE?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’D LIKE TO ACCOMPLISH BEFORE THE END OF THE YEAR?
WHAT’S THE MOST MEANINGFUL COMPLIMENT YOU’VE RECEIVED?
HOW DO YOU RECHARGE AND TAKE CARE OF YOURSELF?
WHAT’S A SIGNIFICANT LIFE LESSON YOU’VE LEARNED RECENTLY?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU’D LIKE TO CHANGE ABOUT YOURSELF AND WHY?
HOW DO YOU STAY MOTIVATED DURING TOUGH TIMES?
WHAT’S ONE ADVICE YOU’D GIVE TO YOUR FUTURE SELF?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU WISH YOU KNEW ABOUT YOURSELF SOONER?
WHAT’S A GOAL YOU’RE CURRENTLY WORKING TOWARDS?
WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE KEY TO A FULFILLING LIFE?
WHAT’S ONE THING YOU VALUE MOST IN YOUR LIFE RIGHT NOW?

wildcards.q: WILDCARD: CREATE A SHORT POEM ABOUT YOUR PARTNER. READ IT OUT LOUD.
WILDCARD: MAKE A LIST OF THREE THINGS YOU’RE PROUD OF. COMPARE AND DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: BOTH PLAYERS SHARE A SONG THAT HAS SPECIAL MEANING TO THEM. EXPLAIN WHY.
WILDCARD: EACH PLAYER DESIGNS A “PERSONAL FLAG” THAT REPRESENTS THEM. DRAW AND SHARE.
WILDCARD: SWITCH ROLES AND TELL YOUR PARTNER’S LIFE STORY FROM YOUR PERSPECTIVE.
WILDCARD: WRITE A SHORT STORY ABOUT YOUR PARTNER’S DREAM JOB. SHARE AND DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: THINK OF A WORD THAT REPRESENTS YOUR PARTNER’S ESSENCE. SHARE AND EXPLAIN.
WILDCARD: WRITE DOWN A GOAL YOU HAVE FOR THE NEXT FIVE YEARS. SHARE AND DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: DESIGN A “TATTOO” FOR YOUR PARTNER THAT REPRESENTS THEIR PERSONALITY. DRAW AND SHARE.
WILDCARD: RECORD A 30-SECOND VIDEO MESSAGE FOR YOURSELF TO WATCH IN A YEAR.
WILDCARD: SHARE A STORY FROM YOUR CHILDHOOD THAT STILL MAKES YOU LAUGH.
WILDCARD: ACT OUT HOW YOU THINK YOUR PARTNER HANDLES STRESS.
WILDCARD: CREATE A 30-SECOND SPEECH PROMOTING YOUR PARTNER TO SOMEONE ELSE.
WILDCARD: WRITE DOWN YOUR TOP THREE LIFE VALUES. COMPARE AND DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: SHARE A RECIPE THAT REPRESENTS YOU. DISCUSS ITS MEANING.
WILDCARD: CREATE A “TIME CAPSULE” OF ITEMS THAT REPRESENT YOUR LIFE RIGHT NOW. SEAL IT TIGHT AND HIDE IT SOMEWHERE SAFE. SET A REMINDER TO OPEN IT TOGETHER IN AT LEAST 5 YEARS.
WILDCARD: DRAW YOUR FAVORITE MEMORY TOGETHER. DISCUSS THE SIGNIFICANCE.
WILDCARD: SHARE A SONG THAT MAKES YOU FEEL STRONG.
WILDCARD: WRITE A MINI STORY ABOUT YOUR PARTNER’S PERFECT DAY. READ IT ALOUD.
WILDCARD: REVEAL A PERSONAL MANTRA OR AFFIRMATION YOU USE AND EXPLAIN ITS MEANING.
WILDCARD: EACH PLAYER SHARES A PICTURE THAT REPRESENTS THEIR FUTURE GOALS. DISCUSS.
WILDCARD: CREATE A SHORT “THANK YOU” SPEECH FOR SOMETHING IN YOUR LIFE.
WILDCARD: SHARE A FUN FACT ABOUT YOURSELF THAT FEW PEOPLE KNOW.
WILDCARD: IMITATE YOUR FAVORITE CELEBRITY FOR 30 SECONDS. THE OTHER PLAYER MUST GUESS WHO IT IS.
WILDCARD: DESCRIBE YOUR PARTNER'S THREE BIGGEST STRENGTHS AND WHY THEY'RE IMPORTANT TO YOU.
WILDCARD: CREATE A SECRET LANGUAGE TOGETHER TO USE IN WEIRD SITUATIONS.
WILDCARD: SHARE A FUNNY OR EMBARRASSING STORY FROM YOUR PAST.
WILDCARD: PLAN A MINI-ADVENTURE INVOLVING BOTH PLAYERS. YOU HAVE 1 MONTH TO ACT UPON IT.
WILDCARD: MAKE A “SPOTLIGHT” ON ONE THING YOU APPRECIATE ABOUT YOUR PARTNER.
WILDCARD: SHARE A STRATEGY YOU USE TO OVERCOME PROCRASTINATION.
WILDCARD: ACT OUT HOW YOU THINK YOUR PARTNER DEALS WITH JOY.
WILDCARD: BOTH OF YOU SHARE SOMETHING YOU’RE CURRENTLY GRATEFUL FOR.
WILDCARD: COMPOSE A SHORT SONG ABOUT YOUR PARTNER (30 SEC). THEN PERFORM IT WITH ENERGY! (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: PLAY ROCK, PAPER, SCISSORS. THE WINNER GETS TO ASK ANY QUESTION, AND THE LOSER MUST ANSWER IT.
WILDCARD: WRITE DOWN A GOAL FOR THE YEAR. EXCHANGE NOTES AND COMMIT TO SUPPORTING EACH OTHER (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: LET'S CAPTURE THIS GAME IN YOUR LIFE'S STORY, TAKE A SELFIE TOGETHER.
WILDCARD: CHALLENGE EACH OTHER TO STEP OUT OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE IN THE NEXT WEEK. (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: GIVE YOUR PARTNER A GENUINE, WARM HUG.
WILDCARD: BOTH OF YOU WRITE A LETTER TO YOUR YOUNGER SELVES (1 MIN). OPTIONALLY, COMPARE LETTERS.
WILDCARD: REVEAL A SECRET OR PERSONAL TRUTH.
WILDCARD: CREATE A QUESTION THAT YOU THINK IS MEANINGFUL AND INSIGHTFUL. MAKE IT COUNT.
WILDCARD: WRITE DOWN ONE THING YOU WANT TO LET GO OF THIS YEAR. READ IT ALOUD, THEN TEAR IT UP TOGETHER. (BOTH PLAYERS).
WILDCARD: SCROLL THROUGH EACH OTHER’S INSTAGRAM PROFILES. PICK THE PHOTO THAT BEST CAPTURES YOUR PARTNER’S ESSENCE AND EXPLAIN YOUR CHOICE.
WILDCARD: GIVE YOUR PARTNER A COMPLIMENT THAT YOU DON’T THINK THEY HEAR OFTEN ENOUGH.
